meanings.definition: A person who is a close friend or companion.
meanings.sent1: Sarah is my coadies; we do everything together.
meanings.sent2: I always have fun with my coadies at the park.
meanings.sent3: My coadies and I laughed so hard at the movie last night.
meanings.sent4: Having a coadies is like having a partner in crime.
meanings.sent5: My coadies is always there for me when I need support.

meanings.definition: To work closely with someone in a cooperative or supportive manner.
meanings.sent1: Let's coadies on this project to get it done faster.
meanings.sent2: We need to coadies with the other team to achieve our goal.
meanings.sent3: I coadies with my friend to bake the best cake ever.
meanings.sent4: The dancers coadies gracefully on stage during the performance.
meanings.sent5: We should coadies to make sure everyone is included in the plan.
